_source.short_desc: Create a beautiful event website in minutes. Trusted by more than 300,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike and MIT.
_source.long_desc:
Create a beautiful event website in minutes. 

Build an event website, collect registrations, sell tickets, send invites, track attendees, and promote your event online. Reliable and secure. 

Trusted by more than 500,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike, MIT and Refinery29.
_source.pricing_details: Free starter version with 2 paid versions.
_source.target_audience: Event planners who need a beautiful event website.

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most User Friendly Event Management Software Report

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features: Smartsheet is a work execution platform that enables agencies of all sizes to move faster, drive innovation, and achieve more. Extraordinary marketers rely on Smartsheet for event management, initiative tracking, content calendars, campaign management, and more. With Smartsheet, you can centralize resources, maintain consistency across projects and campaigns, and increase speed to market. Seamlessly connect marketing efforts to ROI and improve alignment with all involved stakeholders.

related_products.short_desc: Airtable is the database that anyone can use with a beautiful spreadsheet interface.
related_products.features: Airtable is the relational database for the rest of us. With a spreadsheet-like interface that anyone can use, realtime collaboration, and rich features like file attachments and reporting, Airtable is the friendliest modern database.

related_products.short_desc: A complete event marketing and management platform that handles the entire event lifecycle (in-person & virtual) from start to finish.
related_products.features: Cvent delivers an all-in-one event platform for any event, and every event. Our platform simplifies the management of each stage of the event lifecycle while giving you the data and insights you need to maximize your value. Whether in-person, virtual, or hybrid, you'll have a single platform with everything you need to find suppliers, engage attendees, maximize sponsor value, and capture important event data.

related_products.short_desc: Eventzilla is an online event registration & marketing platform for virtual in-person and hybrid events.
related_products.features:
Eventzilla is a leading cloud-based event registration & marketing platform for in-person and virtual events. We make it easy for event organizers to create a beautiful, professional web presence to promote their events.

Works perfect for conferences, fundraisers, classes, reunions, concerts, & sports events.

Eventzilla has everything you need to setup a custom event website, publish event schedule, process payments, manage attendee details and check-in easily.

related_products.short_desc: monday.com is the customizable no-code event marketing platform that lets you plan, manage, effectivize, and track all work processes.
related_products.features: monday.com is the customizable no-code platform for all your event marketing needs. Visualize your planning process and manage all marketing processes through intuitive dashboards, effectivize workflows with automations, and collaborate with your entire team in-platform, in real-time. In addition, you can easily integrate the tools and apps you already use, manage budgets, track and analyze results through advanced reporting features, collect information through custom forms, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Webex Events (formerly Socio) powers flexible, end-to-end virtual, in-person and hybrid event experiences.
related_products.features: Webex Events (formerly Socio) is the end-to-end event management & experience platform powering immersive, and inclusive virtual, hybrid, and in-person events. With features like registration, ticketing, schedules, live streaming, & simulive; attendee engagement tools like games, polls, chat, & sponsorship showcase; and in-person products like onsite check-in & badge printing, lead retrieval & live display,

related_products.short_desc: Accelevents is an all-in-one events platform that empowers you to expand your reach and drive sustainable growth.
related_products.features:
Accelevents is an all-in-one event management platform for in-person, virtual & hybrid events. Built to save you time and frustration while delivering measurable results for your organization. 

As a leading event technology platform, Accelevents is redefining the way brands connect with their audiences with a user-friendly yet robust set of customizable and interactive features.

related_products.short_desc: ClickMeeting is a browser-based webinar solution, brings the power of webinars to organizations of any size
related_products.features: ClickMeeting is a browser-based webinar solution, brings the power of webinars to organizations of any size, from one-person firms to multinational enterprises. The web-based solution is easy to use and covers the entire webinar process from preparation to presentation, and from interaction to follow-up. The software requires no installation and works on all devices and operating systems.

related_products.short_desc: Build every in-person, virtual, and hybrid event with Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform and event marketing tools.
related_products.features: Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform powers immersive in-person, virtual, and hybrid experiences for the world's leading brands. The Bizzabo Event Experience OS is a data-rich open platform that empowers Event Experience Leaders to promote their events with a powerful suite of event marketing tools. Create a beautifully branded event website, personalize attendee journeys to fill the room, and drive conversions with dynamic registration flows.

related_products.short_desc: Aventri's event marketing platform is the most flexible and customizable way to target and connect with the right attendees.
related_products.features: You've automated your marketing. Time to automate your events? Event automation begins with the right technology and the right people supporting you and your team. From best-in-class online registration to marketing to your attendees, establishing attendee room blocks, on-site check-in, and getting real-time analytics on how your event or meeting is performing, Aventri allows its clients to create valuable in-person experiences, grow influential communities, expand brands and drive ROI.

similar_products.short_desc: A complete event marketing and management platform that handles the entire event lifecycle (in-person & virtual) from start to finish.
similar_products.features: Cvent delivers an all-in-one event platform for any event, and every event. Our platform simplifies the management of each stage of the event lifecycle while giving you the data and insights you need to maximize your value. Whether in-person, virtual, or hybrid, you'll have a single platform with everything you need to find suppliers, engage attendees, maximize sponsor value, and capture important event data.

similar_products.short_desc: Hearty technology, lightweight package. We combine serious event marketing software with a platform designed for regular humans.
similar_products.features: Swoogo is the #1 event marketing software that increases your productivity and ROI-not your stress levels. Designed for virtual & in-person events with hybrid capabilities, we provide a platform that creates a streamlined, customizable experience for your attendees from start to finish. Includes unlimited events & registrations, robust registration capabilities, built-in analytics, free integrations, intuitive website+email marketing tools, attendee management & world-class customer support.

similar_products.short_desc: Trumba helps organizations increase event awareness and attendance through innovative calendar publishing and event registration tools.
similar_products.features:
Trumba Connect offers an innovative calendar publishing and event management software preferred by Higher Ed, K-12 Education, Healthcare, Community and Government organizations nationwide. 

Publish branded design-quality calendars; schedule, promote, and track events. Attendees can easily find events, register and stay informed of changes.

Make your life easier too-by automating tedious event management tasks in one place (often eliminating the need for multiple event management platforms).

similar_products.short_desc: A comprehensive event management software that empowers organizers to plan, promote, and run online and in-person events.
similar_products.features: Zoho Backstage is all-in-one event management software to plan and run in-person, virtual, and hybrid event experiences from beginning to end with greater efficiency and impact. Right from designing an event website, selling tickets, and marketing an event, to communicating with attendees, presenting sessions, and analyzing an event's performance, Zoho Backstage has everything you need to grow your event and accelerate its success.

similar_products.short_desc: Prekindle is an event management, ticketing, and marketing platform.
similar_products.features: Prekindle is an event management, ticketing, and marketing platform.  We help businesses sell tickets to events online and spread the word with powerful built in marketing tools.  Prekindle is incredibly flexible, and can do just about anything. We have developed our software over 10 years, focused on the needs of our professional clients.

With Smartsheet, you can centralize resources, maintain consistency across projects and campaigns, and increase speed to market. Seamlessly connect marketing efforts to ROI and improve alignment with all involved stakeholders.

similar_products.short_desc: Get instant access to event info, vendors, pricing, and availability on the Confetti virtual experience booking platform.
similar_products.features:
Confetti helps save time and energy in the events industry. Book engaging virtual events for client acquisition & retention in only a matter of minutes. Filter experiences by type and find what aligns with your needs. 

See all event info upfront, including pricing and availability. Get connected with professional & vetted vendors. All in an instant.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Campaign Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Campaign Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Campaign Management software enables organizations to automate the tracking, delivery, reporting and analysis of marketing campaigns and promotions through the integration of customer data sources and the ability to parse the data through a broad range of analytic searches. Using this type of marketing campaign reporting allows organizations to evaluate and optimize multiple campaigns for different business sectors based on real-world analysis of their effectiveness. Campaign Management software is related to Email Marketing software, Marketing Automation software and Search Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Marketing software automates the processes of creating, publishing, and tracking the ROI of content-related marketing campaigns. Common functionality of these solutions includes workflow management, collaborative editing, scheduled publishing, SEO analytics, and social integration.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Email Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Email Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Email Marketing software enables the automation of email communication with prospects and customers. Organizations use Email Marketing software to increase the efficiency of their email marketing efforts, manage mailing lists and monitor the effectiveness of their marketing campaigns. Email Marketing applications can also aid in the regular production of customer-oriented newsletters, the management of email templates for multiple campaigns or market segments, and ongoing customer relationship management efforts. Email Marketing software is related to Campaign Management software and Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Booking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Event Booking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Booking software simplifies the process of registering for an event by enabling electronic registration and payment.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Check In software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Event Check In tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Check In software helps significantly speed up the check in process at conferences, performances, and other events. This type of software can be deployed on mobile devices, such as smartphones and tablets, as well as kiosks, and often provides badge printing capabilities. Many organizations use Event Check In software to capture attendee information for lead generating purposes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Event Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Management software automates marketing, registration, coordination and scheduling of events. Planners use Event Management applications to manage the planning and process of meetings and events, including marketing, attendee registration, badge creation, calendar generation and venue space management. These applications also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery and fee payment. Event Management software is related to Registration software and Ticketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Influencer Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Influencer Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Influencer Marketing software helps organizations discover, develop, and track relationships with prominent social media players who can promote corporate brand and content to their followers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Landing Page software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Landing Page tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Landing Page software helps marketers increase conversions and identify the most effective messaging with A/B testing. Most Landing Page software integrates with many of the marketing tools you use everyday, like email automation, CRM, and web analytics. Usually, no coding experience is required to build your own landing pages. Email Marketing software, Lead Management software, Marketing Automation software, Sales Enablement software, and SMS (Text) Marketing software are closely related to Landing Page software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Analytics software collects and processes data needed for performance evaluation and strategic planning within marketing departments.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Attribution software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Attribution tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Attribution software helps marketers identify the best performing advertising channels for the company.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Planning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Planning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Planning software helps businesses outline marketing strategy, budgets, and goals and measure progress against these parameters.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Event Apps software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Event Apps tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Event Apps enable event organizers to consistently distribute important event information to the attendees in real time and facilitate networking among attendees.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Marketing software helps businesses reach and engage their audiences on mobile devices via text messages and mobile optimized promotional offers and notifications.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Registration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Registration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Registration software automates the process of registering for conferences, meetings, classes, and other events. These applications offer a customizable solution for attendance tracking and event or meeting registration tasks. They also provide tools for processing payments either in advance or onsite, as well as donation collection and volunteer coordination features. Registration solutions also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery, and fee payment. Registration software is related to Event Management software and Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top SMS Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of SMS Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: SMS (Text) Marketing software provides the tools needed to launch and support text marketing campaigns. With SMS Marketing software in your arsenal you can quickly subscribe customers and send important alerts with mass messaging tools. Text marketing software can be used to advertise weekly specials, send coupons, solicit feedback, poll customers, and promote contests. Looking for other ways to improve your marketing? Learn more with our Channel Management software, Email Marketing software, and Marketing Automation software categories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Social Media Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Social Media Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Social Media Marketing software automates the creation, tracking, and management of online campaigns through social sites such as Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, etc. This software helps with publishing coupons and promotions and collecting customer response metrics.Social Media Marketing platforms offer integrated email that could be linked to multiple accounts in any of the social networks thus creating a single, go-to place for several simultaneous campaigns. Social Media Marketing software is closely related to Social Monitoring software and many solutions offer both capabilities in one package. For related software see also Campaign Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Ticketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Ticketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Ticketing software manages and automates online, kiosk, and box office ticketing for special events, theaters, parks, festivals, fairs, travel, and other activities. These applications help manage seat selections, event management, exhibitor data, performer assignments and locations, as well as online and onsite payment processing. Ticketing solutions also often integrate other business processes such as inventory control, transaction control, fulfillment history and sales tracking. Ticketing software is related to Event software, Registration software and Kiosk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Website Builder software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Website Builder tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Website Builder software makes it possible to quickly create your own website with design tools, templates, domain hosting, and coding options. They may also include widgets for social networking integrations, credit card processing, and multimedia. Several of these applications also include built-in SEO tools to help your website perform better in searches. Some related applications can be found in the Content Management software and Landing Page software categories.

_source.features_tokenized_text: audience_targeting campaign_management email_marketing event_calendar landing_pages/web_forms reporting/analytics social_promotion surveys_&_feedback website_management
